author: andschwa
body:
Resolves #1230.
- Removes the runtime uses of `IsCore` and replaces with `CORECLR` (and notes for @mirichmo)
- Renames `IsCore` to `IsCoreCLR`
- Removes some deprecated guards

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I'm not sure why this failed... will investigate tomorrow.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
UGH.

It's because there are files committed that are:

Little-endian UTF-16 Unicode text, with CRLF, CR line terminators

Which is tough to deal with :frowning:

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors @JamesWTruher I'm very confused as I can't reproduce that AppVeyor failure on Windows.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @andschwa that's why there is an [easy way to RDP](https://www.appveyor.com/docs/how-to/rdp-to-build-worker) to a build worker

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors it doesn't reproduce on the AppVeyor machine when debugging it.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Well. what you are going to do about it?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
Wallow in pain and misery.

Really, skip the test and see what happens. If I learn nothing from that, push the changes individually and see what breaks it.

title: Rename IsCore to IsCoreCLR
